languages.text: "Просто знай, что я ценю наши отношения".
"Just know that what we have is something I hold very dear."
languages.original_text: "Просто знай, что я ценю наши отношения".

traits.locale_text: "Just know that what we have is something I hold very dear."
"Just know that what we have is something I hold very dear."
"Just know that what we have is something I hold very dear."
"Just know that what we have is something I hold very dear."
"Just know that what we have is something I hold very dear."
"Just know that what we have is something I hold very dear."

languages.text: 「君との関係は、{mf|俺|私}にとってかけがえのないものだってことだけは覚えていてほしい」
languages.original_text: "Just know that what we have is something I hold very dear."

traits.locale_text: 「君との関係は、{mf|俺|私}にとってかけがえのないものだってことだけは覚えていてほしい」

languages.text: "Ihr sollt wissen, dass das mit uns für mich sehr wichtig ist."
languages.original_text: "Just know that what we have is something I hold very dear."

traits.locale_text: "Ihr sollt wissen, dass das mit uns für mich sehr wichtig ist."

languages.text: « Sachez simplement que ce qu'il se passe entre vous et moi m'est très précieux. »
languages.original_text: "Just know that what we have is something I hold very dear."

traits.locale_text: « Sachez simplement que ce qu'il se passe entre vous et moi m'est très précieux. »

languages.text: «Sepa que atesoro mucho el vínculo que compartimos».
languages.original_text: "Just know that what we have is something I hold very dear."

traits.locale_text: «Sepa que atesoro mucho el vínculo que compartimos».

languages.text: “我只想告诉你，我非常珍视我们之间的一切。”
languages.original_text: "Just know that what we have is something I hold very dear."

traits.locale_text: “我只想告诉你，我非常珍视我们之间的一切。”

languages.text: "Şunu bilmeni istiyorum. Sahip olduğumuz şey benim için çok değerli."
languages.original_text: "Just know that what we have is something I hold very dear."

traits.locale_text: "Şunu bilmeni istiyorum. Sahip olduğumuz şey benim için çok değerli."
